sections.heading: Short title.   This Act may be cited as the Gubernatorial Boards and Commissions Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Gubernatorial Boards and Commissions Act.

sections.heading: Repository of board and commission membership; meeting notices.
sections.text: Repository of board and commission membership; meeting notices.

sections.heading: Eligibility for appointment or reappointment to certain boards and commissions.
sections.text: Eligibility for appointment or reappointment to certain boards and commissions.

sections.heading: Board or commission website.   A board or commission that maintains a website and has a full-time information technology staff shall make freely available to the public on that website the following:
sections.text: Board or commission website. A board or commission that maintains a website and has a full-time information technology staff shall make freely available to the public on that website the following:

sections.heading: Demographic composition; report
sections.text: Beginning October 1, 2015 and for each year thereafter, the Governor shall file a report with the General Assembly detailing the following information:

sections.heading: Savings provision.   Nothing in this Act shall be construed to contravene any State or federal law.
sections.text: Savings provision. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to contravene any State or federal law.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
